UNICEF says essential aid container looted at Haiti portThe U.N. children's agency said on Saturday one of its aid containers at Haiti's main port, stocked with "essential items for maternal, neonatal and child survival," was looted, as gangs increasingly control the capital. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 02:01:16 GMT CPTCOOJ2LNIPNMGMKQ76CKWOVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/unicef-says-essential-aid-container-looted-haiti-port-2024-03-17/Harold Isaac世界美洲
Australia's north braces for Tropical Cyclone MeganResidents in parts of Australia's Northern Territory and Queensland state were urged on Sunday to prepare for a tropical cyclone that is forecast to make landfall in coming days. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 01:44:39 GMT P5ESI3XO2ZMX3HHEZ3FTYZXP4A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-north-braces-tropical-cyclone-megan-2024-03-17/Reuters商业环境
Russia's presidential vote starts final day with accusations of Kyiv sabotageThe final day of the three-day election, which almost certainly will go to Vladimir Putin, will test the strength of the country's opposition, which called for its supporters to vote at the same time in an action dubbed, "Noon Against Putin." Sun, 17 Mar 2024 01:11:49 GMT W4ESTPBLCFI4JABZ7WGM3LIWXA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-presidential-voting-starts-final-day-with-accusations-of-kyiv-sabotage-2024-03-17/Lidia Kelly世界欧洲
US military says it destroyed Houthi drone over Red SeaThe U.S. military said it destroyed a drone fired by the Yemeni Houthis on Saturday, with another presumed to have crashed into the Red Sea. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 00:35:25 GMT TVUAVKZDHBOLREYQCKE4MFDS5A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-military-says-it-destroyed-houthi-drone-over-red-sea-2024-03-17/Reuters世界中东地区
EU to bolster Egypt ties with billions in fundingEuropean leaders are expected to announce a multi-billion euro funding package and an upgraded relationship with Egypt in Cairo on Sunday, part of a push to stem migrant flows across the Mediterranean that has been criticised by rights groups. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 00:32:08 GMT 57PFXSD4RZI6ZAWVV2GFVNDFTA https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-bolsters-egypt-ties-with-trillion-funding-2024-03-17/Reuters世界
Russia will be asked for ceasefire during Olympics, Macron tells Ukraine interviewerRussia will be asked to observe a ceasefire in Ukraine during the Paris Olympics, French President Emmanuel Macron said in an interview from Paris shown on Ukrainian television and posted by a Ukrainian journalist on her YouTube channel on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 22:55:58 GMT APJI46ZD6FNWZMIOAR5VJA5I2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-will-be-asked-ceasefire-during-olympics-macron-tells-ukraine-interviewers-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Niger revokes military accord with US, junta spokesperson saysNiger's ruling junta has revoked with immediate effect a military accord that allows military personnel and civilian staff from the U.S. Department of Defense on its soil, junta spokesperson Colonel Amadou Abdramane said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 21:28:46 GMT JCH6K4UI4RLI5DDC3CZM6H4FQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/niger-revokes-military-accord-with-us-junta-spokesperson-says-2024-03-16/Boureima Balima, Bate Felix世界非洲
Iceland volcano erupts again, spewing fountains of lavaA volcano in Iceland erupted on Saturday for the fourth time since December, the country's meteorological office said, spewing smoke and bright orange lava into the air in sharp contrast against the dark night sky. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 20:53:46 GMT FLKLVHX375IPDOH5DRSB2KKGOE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/iceland-volcano-erupts-again-with-office-says-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Venezuela's Maduro announces candidacy for July re-electionVenezuela's President Nicolas Maduro will run for a second re-election to secure another six-year term in voting planned for July 28, the ruling Socialist party said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 19:35:37 GMT MCJRGROAU5PW7HYCD7X2QRZWJM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuelas-maduro-run-presidential-elections-set-july-socialist-party-says-2024-03-16/Mayela Armas世界美洲
Bolsonaro says he does not fear being put on trialBrazil's former President Jair Bolsonaro said on Saturday he does not fear being put on trial, one day after a police investigation revealed the far-right politician tried to co-op the country's military chiefs in a coup plan to overturn his 2022 election defeat. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 18:29:36 GMT DXX6U4UZBFNPNLYPZBIQYVKI74 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazilian-rightist-bolsonaro-says-he-does-not-fear-being-put-on-Trial-2024-03-16/Reuters世界美洲
Israel prepares return to ceasefire talks; UN says Gaza hunger crisis worsensThe main U.N. aid agency operating in Gaza said on Saturday that acute malnutrition was accelerating in the north of the Palestinian enclave as Israel prepared to send a delegation to Qatar for new ceasefire talks on a hostage deal with Hamas.
